defensiveActions.name: Dodge
defensiveActions.desc: Until the start of your next turn, attacks against you have disadvantage.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Dodge (1 AP): Attacks vs you have DisADV until your next turn.

defensiveActions.name: Dash
defensiveActions.desc: Your movement Speed is doubled until the end of your turn.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Dash (1 AP): Double movement Speed this turn.

defensiveActions.name: Disengage
defensiveActions.desc: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of your turn.
defensiveActions.descSummary: Disengage (1 AP): No opportunity attacks this turn.

offensiveActions.name: Attack
offensiveActions.desc: Make a weapon attack or unarmed strike against a target within range.

offensiveActions.name: Disarm
offensiveActions.desc: Attack Check vs Athletics, Acrobatics, or Trickery.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Disarm (1 AP): Contested check to remove item.

offensiveActions.name: Grapple
offensiveActions.desc: Use a free hand, Athletics Check vs Martial Check. Depends on creature size.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Grapple (1 AP): Athletics vs Martial, restrain target.

offensiveActions.name: Shove
offensiveActions.desc: Athletics Check vs Martial Check to push 1 space or knock Prone.
offensiveActions.descSummary: Shove (1 AP): Push 1 space or knock Prone.

otherActions.name: Ready
otherActions.desc: Choose a trigger and an action. When the trigger occurs, you can use your reaction to perform that action.
otherActions.descSummary: Ready (1 AP): Set trigger for reaction.
